name: Robusto
additionalNotes:
We are very proud to present you The NEW "DG Custom Rolled" cigars.

Our Cigars are all hand-made by Level 9 Cuban Rollers in our New Factory.

We use exclusively premium grade tobacco from the best origins on the Planet.

All cigars are longfiller and rolled using the classic and traditional formula of triple-cap head.

All tobaco bales are selected by Don Gabriel himself at the origin. Selected one by one.

We give a 100% Money Back Guarantee - if you don't like them, we will give you a full refund !

Strength : Medium to fullbodied Cuban Style.

For further details and pics : www.dongabriel.net/dgcr/
